mapper.select: select u.*, f.folder_id as root_folder from users u, folders f where u.user_id = f.folder_reg_user and u.user_email = #{email} and f.folder_parent is null
mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_company, user_department, user_job) values (NEXTVAL('seq_user'), #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{company}, #{department}, #{job}); RETURNING user_id

with ins1 as( insert into users (user_id, user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_company, user_department, user_job) values (NEXTVAL('seq_user'), #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{company}, #{department}, #{job}) RETURNING user_id), ins2 as( insert into folders (folder_id, folder_name, folder_path, folder_parent, folder_reg_user, folder_update_user) values (NEXTVAL('seq_folder'), '개인 문서함' , '/' , null, (select user_id from ins1), (select user_id from ins1)) ) insert into capacities (user_id) values ((select user_id from ins1))
